pages.text: $(thing)Imbuing$() is a multi-faceted skill that is primarily oriented around two main functions:$(br)1. Harvesting Pixons$(br)2. Imbuing Items$(br2)In the early stages of Imbuing, you'll likely find that the best approach to levelling Imbuing is to keep an eye out for Pixons and harvest them.
pages.title: Training Methods

pages.text: As you increase your $(thing)Imbuing$() expertise however, you'll find that you need to start putting the concentrated energy to use.$(br)Normally this would be done through imbuing items in the $(l:aoa3:imbuing_chamber)Imbuing Chamber$(/l), with higher power requirements usually giving more experience.
Additionally, utilising any Imbuing-specific abilities will often give decent amounts of Imbuing experience, depending on the power requirement of that ability.
